mapper.select: select sj.type, st.* ,prof.prof_name ,os.* from subject st join subj_type sj on st.type_code= sj.type_code join professor prof on prof.prof_no = st.prof_no join open_subj os on os.subj_code = st.subj_code

select sj.type, st.* ,prof.prof_name ,os.* ,g.* from subject st join subj_type sj on st.type_code= sj.type_code join professor prof on prof.prof_no = st.prof_no join open_subj os on os.subj_code = st.subj_code join (select open_sub_code, count(*) as count from registration group by open_sub_code) g on os.open_sub_code=g.open_sub_code where 1=1 and subj_year=#{subjYear} and semester=#{semester} and subj_name like '%' || #{subjName} || '%' and grade like '%' || #{grade} || '%' and st.type_code = #{type} and st.faculty_name like '%' || #{facultyName} || '%'
